metadata.name: Mirage
metadata.description:
The sun sinks lower in the sky  
and long shadows appear across the desert.  
In the distance, a mirage appears.  
Deep blue hues of the water,  
the frothy white of the waves,  
a gateway that allows one to see beyond the confines of their surroundings.

One might say,  
Reflections are merely a projection of what we choose to see in our minds. 

-- 

This art piece is a surreal and dreamlike vision of a mirror mirage in the midst of a barren desert landscape. Created using a blend of AI and photography, it is a stunning representation of the power of technology to transform our perceptions of the world around us.

AI Generator: Midjourney  
Photography: Location: Ocean Photographed in The Burren, Ireland  
Edition: 1/1  
Year: 2023  
Photographer: Moonlight Media  
Dimensions: 2048x3072
